title: Broken Air Conditioner
text: The air conditioner in the office has been malfunctioning for the past two days. It is not cooling properly, and the temperature in the room has become unbearable. I request an immediate repair or replacement.

title: Late Delivery of Package
text: I placed an order for a package two weeks ago, and it still has not arrived. The estimated delivery date was missed, and there has been no communication from the delivery company regarding the delay. I request an update on the status of my order.

title: Faulty Internet Connection
text: For the past week, my internet connection has been unstable, frequently disconnecting. I have checked all cables and rebooted the router multiple times, but the problem persists. Please send a technician to resolve this issue.

title: Incorrect Billing
text: I noticed that my latest bill has a charge for a service I did not use. I request an explanation for this charge and a correction if it was applied in error.
